It is an<br>opportunity for researchers in this field to meet and discuss solutions,<br>scientific results, and methods in solving intriguing problems in this<br>field. As a result,<br>intelligent agents and multi-agent systems have demonstrated the<br>capability to use intelligence, knowledge representation and reasoning,<br>and other social metaphors like \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdtrust\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd, \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdgame\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd and \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdinstitution\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd, to<br>not only address real-world problems in a human-like way but to<br>transcend human performance.
